name: Super Shot
description:
Controls:

- Fly:  A / ↑
- Super Shot:  S / →

Super Shot is a Game made as part of the project "A Game A Month" (agameamonth.net). It was made during three weeks using LibGDX as game engine. Graphics are selfmade, sounds are from OpenGameArt.org, background music from soundcloud.com/abstraction.

The project is Open Source, check out my blog (agameamonth.net)!

Come back for a new game every month!

Feel free to leave a comment!
